description: This Kotlin source file defines the navigation graph for an Android TV application using Jetpack Compose. It sets up routes, a persistent left-side navigation menu, and the composable screens associated with each route, enabling navigation between different UI components such as Home, Live TV, Search, Settings, Video Details, and Player screens.

classes.name: Routes
classes.description: Object containing string constants that define the navigation route identifiers used throughout the app.

methods.name: TVNavGraph
methods.description: Main composable function that sets up the navigation controller and scaffold; it defines the overall navigation structure for the app.

methods.name: TVScaffold
methods.description: Private composable that builds the persistent left navigation panel and hosts the NavHost for screen composable destinations.

methods.name: NavButton
methods.description: A composable function creating a themed button for navigation using TV Material3 buttons, with automatic focus support.
